Title: Mosquito.WPF
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A declarative WPF extension library.

WPF and XAML can give you a really powerful way to create user interfaces in a declarative way.
Sometimes.

At other times, the base controls are silly or just painful to use.
This extension library tries to address these issues not by replacing the base controls, but by either augmenting or fixing them - whatever seems most natural.

Note: Currently this is more of a mission statement. Have a look at the documentation to see what is implemented, head over to the Issues to see what will be implemented.

Contents

  • GridColumn - A pseudo-control which works like a WPF version of HTML's <TD> (inside a Grid)
  • GridRow - same as GridColumn, except it works like HTML's <TR>
